Address.value: 1901 GATEWAY DRIVE,SUITE 100, IRVING, Texas, 75038, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Envela Corp and its subsidiaries engage in diverse business activities within the recommerce sector. These include recommercializing luxury hard assets, consumer electronics and IT equipment; and end-of-life recycling solutions. It operates through two recommerce business segments represented by its two direct subsidiaries. DGSE, LLC focuses on the recommercialization of luxury hard assets, and ECHG, LLC focuses on the recommercialization of business IT equipment and consumer electronic devices.
